website_summaries.verdict: A gentle detox kit, perfect for anyone who's hesitant or skeptical about trying a detox cleanse.
pros: After an intense start, we found this detox to be as gentle as it promised to be
While there was no notable weight loss, this pill did eliminate bloating and puffiness
We also felt a surplus of energy after taking these pills
cons: The pill size is quite large, making them difficult to swallow

customer_reviews.title: OPTi fast fix for when you get jammed up LOL
customer_reviews.text: I am on Optifast full fast which means five shakes a day. I made the mistake of going on a long weekend and eating a dinner every night. Because my bowels has all but shut down, I got Pretty constipated and use this to help flush out my system. It's a lot more natural method and it worked great. I feel a lot better. I'm going to keep some on hand in case that happens again!!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie C. Hand

customer_reviews.title: Unsure
customer_reviews.text: Did not seem to do anything. No changes in any body functions. There are several things to take as specific times which did not bother me, but was hoping my complexion would clear or that something else would happen to allow me to know it was working. It worked fine for my wife, but my batch did not do anything for me.
customer_reviews.author: BeeJay

customer_reviews.title: I used that for years now and this time, ...
customer_reviews.text: I used that for years now and this time, as expected helped me kick start healthier diet. I lost about 4 lbs in 4 days when for months I couldn't shed a pound. And definitely limited my enormous sugar cravings. I am a huge fan!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Enzymatic does good job
customer_reviews.text: I used their other products so I wanted give this one a try. I think it’s okay but I guess i am good with Liver Cleanse. I like Enzymatic products. One of my Chinese friend who works in Chinese Medicine suggested me. I am very happy with it so far
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: The powder in this is really hard to drink.
customer_reviews.text: I want to start by saying that overall we liked the cleanse. We slept better and felt great while taking it. The reason for the 3 stars has to do with the powder drink mix. It comes with a chocking warning and for good reason. The powder turns to a gel and expands when you take it. The crystals make the drink a strange gritty taste and hard to swallow. The drink tastes fine but the texture makes it hard to enjoy. While we will probably try the brand again we will make sure we get the one with a pill at night instead of the drink.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the health benefits
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for people who have over eaten recently. Cleans and creates healthy eating habits through gently relieving bowl movement discomfort
customer_reviews.author: Hector Andujar

customer_reviews.title: The large pills I am taking it and it helps me with my bowels movement
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the taste of the powder that you have to mixed with water. It has a very bad taste. And I will like to know what's the ingredients?Also the little small pills I lost it around my dest in my living room. I need to know what's the ingredients?
customer_reviews.author: Carmen A.

customer_reviews.title: Was hoping for more
customer_reviews.text: I too bought this product in hopes I would get a good cleanse but similar to other reviewers I was kind of underwhelmed with it. The process was easy to follow and very gentle. I never had any harsh cramps, darting trips to the bathroom, etc. And the drinkable fiber didn't taste as bad as I was anticipating. My stools were more soft and frequent so it must've been doing something. However I didn't notice a change in feeling, bloat or weight. Not a bad product, I was just hoping to get more out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand and this is the best total body cleanse because it’s gentle.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Anna Larson

customer_reviews.title: Tobacco Cravings disappeared. Did not expect to quit with this.
customer_reviews.text: I usually would detox every now and again with a GNC kit, but they are currently on hold. So I found this one and was surprised at the results. The major indicator it was actually working to flush heavy toxins came around day 4 when I noticed I wasn’t reaching for my chewing tobacco. I didn’t expect to quit nicotine again with a simple detox kit. A lot easier than every other quit product. And definitely a good Detox product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great. Does what it's supposed to do. Is what it is
customer_reviews.author: Kalin Alvey

customer_reviews.title: Cost... on special holiday sale
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years... Good way to jump start a diet..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gentle cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This is a very gentle cleansing product to use. The lemon fiber is very tasty and easy to drink rather than swallowing a bunch of fiber pills. It works well, but it does not give your system a drastic jolt like some cleanses can do.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Didn't see much
customer_reviews.text: Didn't do anything for me. Barely saw any changes Day to day in my body or body functions
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Good for the body
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product several times but have found the best price on Amazon. It is not harsh on the your system and the instructions are easy to follow. Although I don't take this for weight loss I was able to loose 8 lbs the first time I used it and 4 the next. You should only do cleanses 4 times a year or at least that's what I do. I time it with the seasons. You feel very light after you are done. Another thing I like is that you don't feel like you have to rush to the bathroom before you have an accident.
customer_reviews.author: Jeneen Clark

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT !
customer_reviews.text: Been using this cleanse for over 20 years, love it. its easy , and works to restore digestive health!
customer_reviews.author: Fenny

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Important to stick with it and not have any carbonated drinks. You can feel it starting to work within a couple hours of the first dose.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product works great, no cramps, no uncontrolled BM. my skin is clean, no pimples yet.
customer_reviews.author: Opulance

customer_reviews.title: The cleanse worked for me but not for my husband
customer_reviews.text: I bought the cleanse for my husband to help regulate his system, and maybe he would feel better but it didn't work for him at all and he didn't finish the whole 14 days he went maybe 9 days, and that was it. I did the cleanse, and I felt a difference after the first night, I didn't take the probiotics pill because it has dairy in it, and I am lactose, but the 4 pills at night worked enough for me, it didn't make me feel lighter or cleaner but I didn't feel so heavy, I wouldn't try it again but it's maybe worth half the price.
customer_reviews.author: TattedSweetheart

customer_reviews.title: save your money
customer_reviews.text: this stuff did not work at all. save your money and buy something proven. I don't know what that would be yet but ill update once I find something that I know works
customer_reviews.author: Jimb0

customer_reviews.title: Fiber issue
customer_reviews.text: WARNING Make sure you drink a more than 8oz with fiber. It will get stuck in your throat and swelling. Very dangerous. On 3rd day will post followup in 10 days.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do much
customer_reviews.text: Didn't do much and didn't seem to stimulate any bowl activity
customer_reviews.author: George E

customer_reviews.title: great results!
customer_reviews.text: I have used other products and brands before but was really pleased with this product! I was easy to use and worked as they said it would! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: KarenCash

customer_reviews.title: Contains wheat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to help my digestive system out, but on my second day noticed something that alarmed me. Before taking my fiber on the second night, I was looking at the ingredients wondering what else could be in besides psyllium husk. CONTAINS WHEAT. To some, this isn't a big deal. But for me, this would have been potentially life threatening. I've never had a fiber supplement that contained wheat before and I'm a little surprised there wasn't a bigger warning.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Van Dalen

customer_reviews.title: Watste of money
customer_reviews.text: Nothing happened. If you read all the reviews many people had the same results. Don’t waste your time or money
customer_reviews.author: ash

customer_reviews.title: Not what I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: This product was okay but not what I hoped for in the long run. I didn't feel renewed or cleansed. It did help me start eating healthier though
customer_reviews.author: booboo23

customer_reviews.title: Lives Up to It's Claims
customer_reviews.text: I did this whole body cleanse after surgery left me out of sync. It was easy to use, not time-consuming, and worked very well. There were no sudden emergences such as you might have with an over-the-counter laxative. The probiotics help you to avoid recurrences of abdominal distress. I would especially recommend this product to post-surgical patients.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable
customer_reviews.text: A reasonable product overall. Decent price, no nasty side effects. Not as dramatic of an effect as some cleanses though.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: feel great
customer_reviews.text: After the ten days i felt much better. I was suffering from constant stomach pain and decided to try this. It was gentile and easy to take. I wish the fiber was non flavored but it isnt that bad at all. Overall this is a great starter cleanse. It is gentile and made me feel refreshed. Great product for the beginner in the world of body cleanses
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Works for some, but not others
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this due to price and some good reviews. Well I finished the program yesterday and can now look back and say it did nothing but keep me very hydrated. Like the title says it worked for some but not me.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Very gentle
customer_reviews.text: Everyone should do a whole body cleanse four times a year. This is particularly helpful when starting any kind of diet. You'll feel better and look better after using this product. It's gentle, no cramps or running to the bathroom. Get's rid of built up toxins and waste that's been slowing you down.
customer_reviews.author: Jgo2916

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I got this product cause I wanted to reboot ...
customer_reviews.text: Recently just quit smoking and used this to get past the first week of withdrawals. I'm glad I got this product cause I wanted to reboot a healthy regimen of eating, working out, and keeping my body healthy. I like the fiber packets. Easy on the stomach.... For me it wasnt the "weight loss" but just getting ur body feeling normal. Will take again in the next few months to recharge. Still not having a erge to smoke and I think a lot of it has to do with the start of this product. I lost roughly 7 pounds but was also eating right drinking close to a gallon of water a day.
customer_reviews.author: alex youngs

customer_reviews.title: Don't know how it can clean my system if I'm not eliminating any extra waste.
customer_reviews.text: didn't feel much of a difference at all, and I didn't go to the bathroom any more than usual. Don't know how it can clean my system if I'm not eliminating any extra waste.

Well I am day 7 in and I can not tell you anything it has done as of now.

customer_reviews.text: Tried this about 4 years ago and I loved it. Found it randomly online and decided to get it because it was so good to me the first time. Very cheap too because it's normally $30 at Walmart, Sprouts, Walgreens, et cetera. 10/10 would recommend.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for

I immediately turned around and tried that advocare cleanse after a friend encourgaged me and it worked much much better. Was pricier of course, but when it comes to your health and wellness, you do get what you pay for!

customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this even worked but my husband tried it. He had stomach pains for 3 whole days and was in a lot of pain. I guess his insides were really cluttered, not sure?? But he says he will never use this again. He did use the bathroom a lot more during that week but I'm not sure there was any change in his energy level or anything else - just stomach pain.

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with product

I used this to also help cut my caffeine intake from about 500mg down to 75mg a day. and I feel so much better. I plan to do this once every 3 months to just give my body a kick start.

customer_reviews.text: Did not like this product once so ever. Had zero effects, actually gained weight and I was following a strict diet. Waste of money.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product

customer_reviews.text: I wish I could do a mockumentary on this horrible product. The original Whole Body Cleanse with pills and with out lemon flavor is WAYYYYYYYYYYY! better than this one. To prove it, I took this with my family and they were also sick and with sharp stomach pains. etc. I will never take this again. The other original I normally ordered, I had taken at least four times before. NO ISSUES. Lost weight, no cramps, hurting, felt lighter, did well. I orded this buy accident, will never do this again, was worst than Dr. Natura! Still not feeling well, feel drained, just horrible! Horrible! I wish I could give it a negative five stars!

The most effective thing for me was the probiotic capsules. It wasn't a bad product-it just wasn't for me.

customer_reviews.title: Late results, but still good!
customer_reviews.text: OK, not a miracle solution, but I have noticed much more "normal" system functions as a result of the cleansing. Improvement started about 5 days after the program was over, proper functioning system should result in better body maintenance. Good stuff.

customer_reviews.title: Not a great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm not overweight, but I've been stuck at 154 lbs no matter how much I work out and diet. So I thought I would try this cleanse to jump start a more intense work out regimen that includes spinning, pilates, and weight training. While the product worked as far as cleansing goes, I've actually gained 3 lbs during the week I've been using this. I drink tons of water, eat healthy, and work out daily so it must be this product that making me bloat so badly. Also, I've had terrible headaches and backaches since I began the cleanse. This product is just kind of...blah.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy, would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Took this as directed and was extremely happy with it! I was a little tired and took my exercise level down significantly, but was still able to get out a few times for s little more strenuous activity. I felt a LOT better while taking it but had terrible junk food craving afterwards. I also tripled my water intake as well. Didn't cause any diarrhea issues for me, but I also take lots of probiotics and really try to avoid processed foods. I noticed that if I consumed bread, packaged food of any kind, I was more like to end up in the bathroom sooner. So following a healthy eating routine and lots of water are key.
customer_reviews.author: AmznCustomerBD

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Started this in combination with moderate dieting meaning no pork and I didn't stuff my face...incorporated green smoothies twice a day, started the ACV drink, and increased water intake (tried a gallon a day, whew!)...works wonderfully if you make minor changes. Didn't weigh myself but I definitely felt lighter and more energized. No emergency bathroom breaks just when I did go...it empties you. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: E3's Mommie

customer_reviews.title: Waste Money & Time
customer_reviews.text: I received this product early than dated. Started it the following day as directed. Personally this did absolutely no cleaning. Made me feel sick whenever I took it to the point of nausea and the final straw my stomach bloating up like I looked 5 months pregnant! Not happy at all with this was a waste of time and money. I have better cleansing results doing detox drinks than this. DON BUY THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Porreca

customer_reviews.title: What just happened??
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I have tried several cleansers and this particular cleanser did not do anything but give me gas. I actually gained weight during thiscleansing process.
customer_reviews.author: Errolcel

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several cleansing products and this one does not work! It made me feel and look bloated. The girls at the gym teased me by saying I looked pregnant! Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: NOTHING, another failure
customer_reviews.text: this is a chunk that came out of the fiber mix drink, yuck, this is my 7th day on this cleanse and I do not have any bowel movements from it, It is not "cleansing" me, I do go to the restroom to urinate a lot but that's only because i'm drinking tons of water. There are big pills that you have to take during this cleanse, you have to take them 5 at one time, the fiber drink is not nasty but it is grainy. another waste of money SMH,
customer_reviews.author: christ

product_meta.title: Enzymatic Therapy Whole Body Cleanse Complete 10-Day System Detox Activation Cleansing Kit
product_meta.description: Why cleanse? To refresh and rejuvenate. Cleansing up to 4 times a year can help you feel your best. It can be like scheduling a whole new start in your habits and your life. Toxins are everywhere. They're in our air, food and water - you can't escape them. Your digestive and overall health can be vulnerable to exposure to these environmental toxins. Why use Whole Body Cleanse? This 10-day system includes: Detox Activation cleansing formula includes magnesium hydroxide, milk thistle, and beneficial cleansing botanicals all in one product for a gentle cleanse.* Fiber Fusion Daily cleansing fiber drink mix includes glucomannan to help adsorb, bind, and flush toxins.* Probiotic Pearls active cultures to replenish healthy digestive bacteria and protect against occasional bloating, constipation, and digestive discomfort.* Whole Body Cleanse renews your body from the inside out, eliminating toxins.*
feature_bullets: Revitalizing, Complete 10-day Cleansing System with Probiotics, with Lemon Flavored Mixable Fiber
Cleansing up to 4 times a year can help you feel your best. It can be like scheduling a whole new start in your habits and your life.
Detox Activation cleansing formula includes magnesium hydroxide, milk thistle, and beneficial cleansing botanicals all in one product for a gentle cleanse
Fiber Fusion Daily cleansing fiber drink mix includes glucomannan to help adsorb, bind, and flush toxins
Probiotic Pearls active cultures to replenish healthy digestive bacteria, and relieve occasional gas, bloating, and digestive discomfort
